documentation.author: CERNER
documentation.purpose: This rule is needed to inform the nurse/MD/RRT/Reporting Officer that patient has a clinical events related to SIRS/Sepsis.
documentation.explanation: The rule is needed to alert the nurse/MD/RRT/Reporting Officer that his/her patient has had clinical events consistent with SIRS/Sepsis.
documentation.impact: L2 executes a CCL program called LH_CLOUD_SEPSIS. This program will take the JSON representation of the OUTCOME and extract the individual SIRS criteria and Organ Dysfunction criteria that created the alert. LH_CLOUD_SEPIS takes 4 parmaters. The first 3 are message names that are used in subsequent Action Templates. $1 is the name of the Organ Dysfunction Criteria message. $2 is the name of the SIRS Criteria message. $3 contains the code name of the triggering Outcome. $4 is the delimeter that will be used between multiple ORGDYS and SIRS criteria in the resulting message.

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_EXPERT_TRIGGER_E
templateDefinitions.definition: the Expert trigger is listed in TRIGGER.

statements.statement: select trigger_name="Double click in lower box to enter trigger name(s)" from (dummyt d with seq = 1)

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_DEBUGEKM_E
templateDefinitions.description: Turn debug messaging on or off

statements.statement:
select debug_status = if (d.seq = 1) "On for subsequent Evoke Templates" elseif (d.seq = 2) "Off for subsequent Evoke Templates" elseif (d.seq = 3) "On for all Logic Templates" elseif (d.seq = 4) "On for all Action Templates" elseif (d.seq = 5) "On for all Logic and Action Templates" elseif (d.seq = 6) "To FullAudit for this module only" elseif (d.seq = 7) "Additional EKSDATA logging" ENDIF, _hidden = if (d.seq = 1) 1 elseif (d.seq=2) 0 elseif (d.seq=3) 2 elseif (d.seq=4) 3 elseif (d.seq=5) 4 elseif (d.seq=6) 5 elseif (d.seq=7) 6 endif
FROM (DUMMYT D WITH SEQ = VALUE(7))

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_STOP_LOGIC_L
templateDefinitions.definition: the following templates are false, MODE logic evaluation
templateDefinitions.description: Used to control efficiency of Action Group rules

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_EXEC_CCL_L
templateDefinitions.definition: Execute PROGRAM_NAME with parameters OPT_PARAM and link to OPT_LINK

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_ENCOUNTER_DETAIL_L
templateDefinitions.definition: the patient's ENC_DETAIL QUAL DETAIL_VALUE for the same encounter as OPT_LINK

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_PREVIOUS_ACTION_L
templateDefinitions.definition: If previous action of ACTION_NAME was executed for SCOPE OPT_LINK initiated by PERSONNEL user in last OPT_TIME_NUM OPT_TIME_UNIT
templateDefinitions.description: If previous action of ACTION_NAME was executed for SCOPE OPT_LINK initiated by PERSONNEL user in last OPT_TIME_NUM OPT_TIME_UNIT

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_BUILD_MESSAGE_L
templateDefinitions.definition: ACTION a message named MSGNAME with text of MSGTEXT preceded by OPT_DELIMITER
templateDefinitions.description: Create or add to a text message to be used by subsequent templates

statements.statement:
select action = if (d.seq = 1) "Create" elseif (d.seq = 2) "Append To" ENDIF, _hidden = if (d.seq = 1) "1" elseif (d.seq = 2) "2" ENDIF
FROM (DUMMYT D WITH SEQ = VALUE(2))

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_BUILD_MESSAGE_A
templateDefinitions.definition: ACTION a message named MSGNAME with text of MSGTEXT preceded by OPT_DELIMITER
templateDefinitions.description: Create or add to a text message to be used by subsequent templates

statements.statement:
select action = if (d.seq = 1) "Create" elseif (d.seq = 2) "Append To" ENDIF, _hidden = if (d.seq = 1) "1" elseif (d.seq = 2) "2" ENDIF
FROM (DUMMYT D WITH SEQ = VALUE(2))

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_MESSENGER_ESC_A
templateDefinitions.definition: Send message to OPT_RECIPIENT and/or OPT_FT_RECIPIENT with subject OPT_SUBJECT, text OPT_MSG and a OPT_PRIORITY priority related to ESC_LINK. Delay escalation of the message for TIME_INTERVAL TIME_UNIT and STOP_FLAG escalation.
templateDefinitions.description: Send escalation message to printer, email, alphapager

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_MESSENGER_A
templateDefinitions.definition: Send message to RECIPIENT with subject OPT_SUBJECT and message MSG with a OPT_PRIORITY priority.
templateDefinitions.description: Send message to printer, email, alphapager

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_CE_CREATE_CODED_CE_A
templateDefinitions.definition: Create a STATUS, OPT_NORMALCY, EVENT_NAME result of VALUE1 OPT_UNITS_OF_MEASURE on the same encounter as LINK with OPT_COMMENT_TYPE of OPT_COMMENT and RESEND send this event back through Discern Expert. OPT_INHERIT_DYN_LABEL inherit the dynamic label, if one exisits.

values.value: To FullAudit for this module only

value.value:
SIRS Alert: This patient has met at least 3 SIRS criteria. Please contact the physician and consider ordering/reviewing the following to evaluate for organ dysfunction:

Lactic Acid
Creatinine
Total Bilirubin
Platelet Count
PTT
Blood Culture
UA with Culture

Sepsis Alert: The following information suggests that this patient may have sepsis. Please notify the physician immediately to ensure the patient is on the appropriate medication therapy. Early goal directed therapy is essential for the treatment of sepsis. Time dependent intervention may impact patient outcome.
